name: Mobile Suit Gundam Gihren's Greed: The Menace of Axis V
summary: The last in the line of the Gihren's Greed series, Menace of Axis is the most expansive of this "Turn-based Strategy" series. Make your choices and as the leader of the Federation, Zeon, The Titans, the A.E.U.G, or even alternate timeline versions of Zeon where Garma or Char rose to power. Your choices can change history, what will you decide to do?
